casebody.data:
STATE EX REL. LLOYD
v.
POKORNY 2019-0799 Supreme Court of Ohio. August 23, 2019

CASE ANNOUNCEMENTS

MOTION AND PROCEDURAL RULINGS

On relator's motion to dismiss Bradley Hull IV as her attorney. Motion granted. Relator's motion for default judgment and motion to grant writ of mandamus and recovery of costs and damages against respondent denied as moot.
